document_description: This document sets Japan's vision on how to achieve a hydrogen-based society by 2050 and provides an action plan for its realisation. It specifically seeks to decarbonise the energy, industry and transportation sectors.The Strategic Roadmap for Hydrogen and Fuel Cells defines 1) new targets on the specification of basic technologies and the breakdown of costs, 2) necessary measures for achieving these goals; and 3) that Japan will convene a working group consisting of experts to review the status of implementation in each area stipulated by the roadmap.
